item.title: The lessons and laments of DeepSeek, according to VCs
item.description: Hurricane DeepSeek ripped through the venture capital world with a furor on Monday.

item.title: Nike’s CEO was abruptly yanked out of retirement with one unexpected phone call
item.description: The 62-year-old was finally kicking up his feet after working a 30-years-stint at Nike, when he got the call to cut his retirement short and lead the ...

item.title: Germany stuck in ‘deep economic crisis’ as major industry lobby predicts longest downturn since 1990 reunification
item.description: The BDI says Germany has once again become one of the EU's economic laggards amid a six-year decline in country's industry.

item.title: Ikea’s foray into secondhand furniture is the ‘smarter’ thing to do—but scaling it up will be a challenge, says group CEO Jesper Brodin
item.description: Despite the challenges and less than developed market for pre-owned goods, it’s here to stay, says the Ingka Group CEO.
